title: Today's Brief - February 22, 2026
description: OpenAI slashes its spending target from $1.4 trillion to $600 billion while cybersecurity stocks crash 8%+ as Anthropic's new AI security tool sparks fears that traditional cyber companies could become obsolete. From Supreme Court tariff rulings shaking up e-commerce to Tesla losing a $243 million Autopilot verdict, we're breaking down the biggest market moves and tech disruptions.
